vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σχοίν-ισμα, ατος, τό,
piece of land measured out by the σχοῖνος, portion, allotment, [LXX]
__2 generally, division, portion of a people,[LXX]
vocabInfos.shortDef: a measured out line; a piece of measured out land
vocabInfos.mediumDef: a measured out line; a piece of measured out land
